work.name: Lockheed Martin - Rotary & Mission Systems
work.summary: Starting as an intern in 2021, I worked on setting up flight simulators and designed high-level system diagrams for a UAV as part of an intern project. In 2022 I gained experience with DAQ systems, participated in a trade study, and acted as the Project Lead for my teams' internship project. I started as a full time hire after graduation and currently work on networking software for one of our flagship simulators. I have also acted as Lead Software Engineer in a small team of people upgrading an accessory to this simulator.
highlights: DAQ Systems, C++, Bash Scripting, Git, AGILE mentality, Project Management, DOORS Next

work.name: Rensselear Polytechnic Institute
work.summary: Aided in student learning and problem solving skills development for Electric Circuits under Dr. Shayla Sawyer. Held office hours weekly and assisted in grading of student labs.

education.institution: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, Troy, NY, USA
courses: Key Courses: Robotics I & II, Mechatronics, Internetworking of Things, Embedded Control, Fields & Waves, Microelectronics Technology, Electrical Energy Systems
Skills: Object-Oriented Programming, Real-Time Control Systems, FPGA Programming, Power Systems Analysis, Circuit Analysis, Electrical Simulation and Test
Software: Python, C++, ROS, MATLAB, Simulink, LTSpice
